line_1: His knowledge would by patient labour earn,
line_2: Nor ever deem'd himself too wise to learn;

line_1: Come then, my soul, and strive to earn
line_2: What heart but must with rapture burn

line_1: And ecchoing praises such as fiends might earn,
line_2: And folly pays, resound at your return.

line_1: The joys thy kind intentions earn,
